title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5905.4 - Notification of intent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5905.4 - Notification of intent

State Regulations
A Federal SBIR Phase I award recipient should submit to the
executive director of the foundation written notification of the firm's
intention to apply for a Federal SBIR Phase II award and to apply for a State
research contract, at least 30 days prior to the completion of the Federal SBIR
Phase I research. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5905.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
